entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few rain showers changing to a few flurries or rain showers before morning. Snow level 2400 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:43 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
